title: 澳洲外長：不會容許中國侵犯澳洲言論自由

replies.msg:
Foreign Minister Marise Payne has warned that the Morrison government won’t tolerate foreign interference in the exercise of free speech in Australia, after a senior Chinese diplomat backed “patriotic behaviour” by Chinese students who clashed violently with pro-Hong Kong protesters at the University of Queensland.

Senator Payne warned that Australia expected foreign diplomats to respect Australia’s rights to free speech and lawful protest, “even on contentious and sensitive issues”. “The government would be particularly concerned if any foreign diplomatic mission were to act in ways that could undermine such rights, including by encouraging disruptive or ­potentially violent behaviour,” she said.

The warning followed a statement by Chinese consul-general in Brisbane Xu Jie, who praised Chinese students for confronting what he said were “anti-China separatist” protesters with “ulterior motives” at UQ this week.

“The consulate general attaches great importance to the safety of Chinese students, affirms the spontaneous patriotic behaviour of Chinese students, resolutely opposes the words and deeds of any separatist countries, and opposes the use of these events to create the opposition between Chinese and Hong Kong students and ­incite anti-China sentiment,” he said.
https://www.theaustralian.com.au/nation/politics/china-diplomat-slapped-down-over-uni-protest/news-story/7b0acc2e8b2b8541adc0f61e6a2e3a68

香港人：不會容許中國侵犯香港言論自由
叫班仆街人渣返去大陸共享繁榮啦！

【Now新聞台】澳洲昆士蘭大學日前有香港和內地留學生在反逃犯條例修訂集會中發生衝突，外長佩恩警告，澳洲政府不容忍外國政府妨礙當地言論自由。

佩恩警告，澳洲政府期望外國駐當地的外交人員能尊重澳洲言論自由和合法示威的權利，即使是涉及具爭議和敏感事項，她又說如果外交人員作出削弱這些權力的行為，包括鼓勵具破壞性或潛在暴力行為，澳洲政府會特別關注。

數百名香港學生周三在昆士蘭大學舉行反修例集會期間，遭大批內地學生包圍，雙方起衝突。中國駐布里斯班總領事館隨後發表聲明指，是極少數別有用心的人進行反華分裂活動，引起包括內地和香港在內的中國留學生的憤慨和抗議，總領事館肯定中國留學生自發的愛國行為，堅決反對任何分裂國家的言行並反對一些人借事件製造中國內地和香港學生對立，煽動反華情緒。
